title: Geometric
body: The lifetime risk of developing pancreatic cancer is about one in $$78$$ $$(1.28\%)$$. Let X $$=$$ the number of people you ask until one says he or she has pancreatic cancer. Then X is a discrete random variable with a geometric distribution: $$X\pm G \frac{1}{78}$$ or $$X\pm 0.0128G$$
